sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

const StarWarsGalaxyMap = () => {
  const [systems, setSystems] = useState([]);
  const [selectedSystem, setSelectedSystem] = useState(null);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [user, setUser] = useState(null);
  const [loginForm, setLoginForm] = useState({ username: '', password: '' });
  const [loginErrors, setLoginErrors] = useState({});
  const [showLogin, setShowLogin] = useState(false);
  const [quiz, setQuiz] = useState({
    currentQuestion: 0,
    score: 0,
    questions: [
      {
        question: "Яка планета є батьківщиною джедаїв?",
        options: ["Tatooine", "Coruscant", "Tython", "Naboo"],
        correct: 2
      },
      {
        question: "На якій планеті народився Люк Скайвокер?",
        options: ["Alderaan", "Tatooine", "Dagobah", "Hoth"],
        correct: 1  
      },
      {
        question: "Столиця Галактичної Республіки:",
        options: ["Naboo", "Kamino", "Coruscant", "Geonosis"],
        correct: 2
      }
    ],
    selectedAnswer: null,
    showResults: false,
    completed: false
  });
  const [surveyData, setSurveyData] = useState({
    favoriteFaction: '',
    visitedSystems: [],
    galaxyKnowledge: ''
  });

  const systemPositions = {
    // Core Worlds
    "Alderaan": { x: 58, y: 42, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Core Worlds' },
    "Coruscant": { x:48, y: 39, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Core Worlds' },
    "Tython": { x: 47, y: 41, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Core Worlds' },
    "Corellia": { x: 62, y: 49, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Core Worlds' },
    "Hosnian": { x: 61, y: 55, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Core Worlds' },
    
    // Inner Rim  
    "Naboo": { x: 62, y: 74, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Inner Rim' },
    "Dorin": { x: 46, y: 27, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Inner Rim' },
    "Ord Mantell": { x: 53, y: 24, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Inner Rim' },
    "Onderon": { x: 66, y: 33, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Inner Rim' },
    "Manaan": { x: 70, y: 45, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Inner Rim' },
    "Mimban": { x: 73, y: 52, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Inner Rim' },
    "Vandor": { x: 71, y: 59, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Inner Rim' },
    "Fondor": { x: 48, y: 72, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Inner Rim' },
    
    // Mid Rim
    "Kashyyyk": { x: 77, y: 50, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Tatooine": { x: 76, y: 72, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Jakku": { x: 36, y: 54, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Kamino": { x: 78, y: 62, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Jedha": { x: 37.5, y: 39, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Iridonia": { x: 49, y: 21, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Taris": { x: 64, y: 19, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Mandalore": { x: 67, y: 21, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Yavin": { x: 70, y: 20, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Felucia": { x: 74, y: 24, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Kijimi": { x: 71, y: 28, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Korriban": { x: 78, y: 34, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Bothawui": { x: 76, y: 59, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Scarif": { x: 80, y: 65, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Savareen": { x: 73, y: 74, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "D'Qar": { x: 63, y: 83, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Crait": { x: 60, y: 81, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Bespin": { x: 45, y: 78, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Sullust": { x: 57, y: 83, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    "Takodana": { x: 41, y: 73, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Mid Rim' },
    
    // Outer Rim
    "Hoth": { x: 44, y: 80, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Dagobah": { x: 61, y: 88, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Endor": { x: 36, y: 61, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Mustafar": { x: 53, y: 88, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Mygeeto": { x: 49, y: 15, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Dantooine": { x: 51, y: 13.5, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Lah'Mu": { x: 57, y: 11, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Dathomir": { x: 67, y: 13, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Bogano": { x: 69, y: 11, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Telos": { x: 71, y: 14.5, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Zeffo": { x: 73, y: 13.5, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Cantonica": { x: 78, y: 20, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Mon Calamari": { x: 81, y: 26, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Lothal": { x: 83, y: 28, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Eadu": { x: 89, y: 46, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Koboh": { x: 83, y: 71, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Aldhani": { x: 81, y: 76, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Geonosis": { x: 78, y: 77, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Ryloth": { x: 79, y: 79, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Nevarro": { x: 75.5, y: 82, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Ferrix": { x: 69, y: 85, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },
    "Utapau": { x: 66, y: 89, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Outer Rim' },

    // Hutt Space
    "Kafrene": { x: 82, y: 40, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Hutt Space' },
    "Kessel": { x: 86, y: 42, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Hutt Space' },
    "Toydaria": { x: 81, y: 55, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Hutt Space' },
    "Nal Hutta": { x: 84, y: 60, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Hutt Space' },
    
    // Unknown Regions
    "Ilum / Starkiller Base": { x: 28, y: 25, color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Unknown Regions' },
    "Exegol": { x:20 , y:26 , color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Unknown Regions' },
    "Csilla": { x:23 , y:34 , color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Unknown Regions' },
    "Rakata": { x:32 , y:44 , color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Unknown Regions' },
    "Ahch-To": { x:30 , y:57 , color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Unknown Regions' },

    // Wild Space
    "Dosuun": { x:39 , y:90 , color: '#E0FFFF', region: 'Wild Space' }
  };

  // Mock API data fetch
  const fetchSystems = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      const mockSystems = [
        // Core Worlds
        {
          name: "Coruscant",
          img: "/systems_images/coruscant.webp",
          main_planet: "Coruscant",
          climate: "Mild",
          air: "Breathable",
          terrain: "Dense, planetwide multilevel urban city",
          population: "1000000000000+",
          diameter: "12240",
          orbital_period: "365",
          rotation_period: "24",
          surface_water: "Less than 1",
          gravity: "1 standard",
          description: "The Coruscant system was a star system located in the Corusca sector of the Core Worlds. It notably contained the planet Coruscant and revolved around a tiny sun. Coruscant, also known as Jewel of the Core Worlds, or Imperial Center during the rule of the Galactic Empire, was an ecumenopolis — a city-covered planet, collectively known as Imperial City — in the Coruscant system of the Core Worlds. Serving as the capital of the galaxy since the ancient days of the old Galactic Republic, Coruscant was at the center of many historic events, such as the Jedi Order's conflict with the Sith."
        },
        {
          name: "Alderaan",
          img: "/systems_images/alderaan.webp",
          main_planet: "Alderaan",
          climate: "Mild",
          terrain: "Forest, grasslands, mountains, cities",
          population: "2000000000",
          diameter: "12500",
          orbital_period: "364",
          rotation_period: "18",
          surface_water: "40",
          gravity: "1 standard",
          description: "The Alderaan system was a star system located in the Alderaan sector in the Core Worlds of the galaxy. Alderaan, located in the Core Worlds, was a terrestrial planet covered with mountains. During the waning decades of the Galactic Republic, it was ruled by Queen Breha Organa and represented in the Galactic Senate by her husband, Senator Bail Prestor Organa. Following the rise of Sheev Palpatine's Galactic Empire, Alderaan played a pivotal role in the establishment of the Rebel Alliance, a movement that sought to restore the Old Republic's values, and was one of its earliest supporters. Because of its ties with the Alliance, the planet was destroyed when Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin decided to test the superlaser of the Death Star, a moon-sized battle station developed by the Empire, at full strength. Among the few survivors of that disaster was Princess Leia Organa, adopted daughter of Bail and Breha Organa and heiress to the royal house of Alderaan."
        },
        {
          name: "Tython",
          climate: "Mild",
          terrain: "Forest, grasslands, mountains",
          population: "Unhabited",
          diameter: "10465",
          orbital_period: "524",
          rotation_period: "31.5",
          surface_water: "20",
          gravity: "1 standard",
          description: "Tython was a terrestrial planet located in Tython system that played a pivotal role in the history of the Jedi Order. A verdant world that was incredibly rich in the Force, Tython was eventually abandoned when the ever-changing hyperlanes in the region drifted away from the planet and became shrouded in myth."
        },
        {
          name: "Corellia",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Hosnian",
          climate: "Mild",
          terrain: "Dense, planetwide multilevel urban city",
          population: "155000000000",
          diameter: "?",
          orbital_period: "?",
          rotation_period: "?",
          surface_water: "? ",
          gravity: "1 standard",
          description: "The Hosnian system was a star system in the galaxy's Core that contained the planets Cardota, Courtsilius, Hosnian, Hosnian Prime, and Raysho. Hosnian Prime was a planet in the Hosnian system of the Core Worlds, located along the Corellian Trade Spine. By 28 ABY, it served as the headquarters of the Galactic Senate and was the capital of the New Republic during the Cold War with the First Order. In 34 ABY, seeking to rid the galaxy of what it saw as illegitimate, the First Order used its superweapon, Starkiller Base, to destroy Hosnian Prime and all other planetary bodies in the system. The superweapon caused the ignition of Hosnian Prime's core, transforming the planet into a star in a pocket nova."
        },

        // Inner Rim
        {
          name: "Naboo",
          climate: "Mild",
          terrain: "Forest, grasslands, mountains, swamps, cities",
          population: "4500000000",
          diameter: "12120",
          orbital_period: "312",
          rotation_period: "26",
          surface_water: "12",
          gravity: "1 standard",
          description: "Мирна планета з красивими містами, батьківщина сенатора Падме Амідали."
        },
        {
          name: "Dorin",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Ord Mantell",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Onderon",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Manaan",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Mimban",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Vandor",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Fondor",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },

        // Mid Rim
        {
          name: "Tatooine",
          climate: "Extremely dry and hot",
          terrain: "Desert",
          population: "200000",
          diameter: "10465",
          orbital_period: "304",
          rotation_period: "23",
          surface_water: "1",
          gravity: "1 standard",
          description: "Пустельна планета з двома сонцями, батьківщина Анакіна та Люка Скайвокерів."
        },
        {
          name: "Kashyyyk",
          climate: "Tropical",
          terrain: "Jungle, forest (giant trees), oceans, swamps",
          population: "45000000",
          diameter: "12765",
          orbital_period: "381",
          rotation_period: "26",
          surface_water: "60",
          gravity: "1 standard",
          description: "Лісиста планета, домівка вукі. Відома своїми величезними деревами."
        },
        {
          name: "Jakku",
          climate: "Extremely dry and hot",
          terrain: "Desert",
          population: "Unknown",
          diameter: "6400",
          orbital_period: "315",
          rotation_period: "26.8",
          surface_water: "Less than 1",
          gravity: "1 standard",
          description: "Jakku was a remote desert planet located in the Jakku system. Though considered by many within the galaxy to be distant and relatively worthless, Jakku was the site of important events that would shape galactic history. In 5 ABY, Jakku was the site of the pivotal Battle of Jakku, which ended the Galactic Civil War in favor of the New Republic and the collapse of the Galactic Empire. A generation later, the planet was the home of the scavenger Rey, who became involved in the events of the Cold War after helping the former First Order stormtrooper Finn and the astromech droid BB-8 escape offworld with a map leading to the missing Jedi Luke Skywalker."
        },
        {
          name: "Kamino",
          climate: "Rainy, wet",
          terrain: "Endless ocean",
          population: "1000000000",
          diameter: "19720",
          orbital_period: "463",
          rotation_period: "27",
          surface_water: "100",
          gravity: "1 standard",
          description: "Kamino was an aquatic planet inhabited by the Kaminoans 7 — a race of tall, elegant beings with long necks who were regarded as a mysterious species that tended to keep to themselves. They were also known for their cloning technology, which was used to create a clone army for the Galactic Republic."
        },
        {
          name: "Jedha",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Iridonia",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Taris",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Mandalore",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Yavin",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Felucia",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Kijimi",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Korriban",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Bothawui",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",

        },
        {
          name: "Scarif",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Savareen",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",

        },
        {
          name: "D'Qar",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",

        },
        {
          name: "Crait",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Bespin",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Sullust",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Takodana",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },

        // Outer Rim
        {
          name: "Hoth",
          climate: "Extremely cold",
          terrain: "Icy mountains, snowy landscapes",
          population: "Inhabitated",
          diameter: "7200",
          orbital_period: "549",
          rotation_period: "23",
          surface_water: "100",
          gravity: "1.1 standard",
          description: "Hoth was a remote, icy planet that notably hosted Echo Base during the Galactic Civil War, the temporary headquarters of the Alliance to Restore the Republic, until the Galactic Empire located them, initiating a major confrontation known as the Battle of Hoth."
        },
        {
          name: "Endor",
          climate: "Mild",
          terrain: "Forest (giant trees), mountains, lakes",
          population: "30000000",
          diameter: "4900",
          orbital_period: "402",
          rotation_period: "18",
          surface_water: "8",
          gravity: "0.85 standard",
          description: "Лісистий супутник, домівка евоків. Місце фінальної битви з Імперією."
        },
        {
          name: "Mustafar",
          climate: "Extremely hot",
          terrain: "Volcanoes, lava flows",
          population: "20000",
          diameter: "4200",
          orbital_period: "412",
          rotation_period: "36",
          surface_water: "0",
          gravity: "1 standard",
          description: "Mustafar was a young, small planet located in the Mustafar system, once a garden world nourished by the Bright Star artifact. It served as the final redoubt of the Separatist Council until the newly-appointed Darth Vader, formerly Anakin Skywalker, was sent by Sidious to slaughter the council, effectively ending the Clone Wars. The Sith Lord was confronted by his wife, Padmé Amidala, and his former Jedi Master, Obi-Wan Kenobi. The latter dueled Vader, defeating him and leaving him to burn on a lava bank. However, Vader was saved when Sidious arrived and carried him offworld."
        },
        {
          name: "Dagobah",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Mygeeto",
          climate: "",

          population: "",

        {

          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",

        },
        {
          name: "Eadu",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Koboh",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Aldhani",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Geonosis",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Ryloth",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Nevarro",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Ferrix",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Utapau",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },

        // Hutt Space
        {
          name: "Kafrene",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Kessel",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Toydaria",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Nal Hutta",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },

        // Unknown Regions
        {
          name: "Ilum / Starkiller Base",
          climate: "Extremely cold",
          terrain: "Icy mountains, caves",
          population: "5200",
          diameter: "660",
          orbital_period: "301",
          rotation_period: "66",
          surface_water: "Unknown",
          gravity: "Unknown",
          description: "Ilum was a snow-covered planet within the Ilum system. It had a kyber crystalline core, and had been utilized by the Jedi Order for the Gathering, a rite of passage in which Jedi younglings had to find and harvest kyber crystals for their lightsabers, which had existed for thousands of standard years. When the Jedi Order was exterminated by order of Darth Sidious, the new Galactic Empire occupied Ilum and began excavating it for its vast supply of kyber crystals, which were to be used in the construction of the first and second Death Stars. The over-mining of the planet caused its core, and later a massive Imperial Trench, to open up along Ilum's equator. After the fall of the Empire, its successor state, the First Order, converted the massive trench into Starkiller Base: a system-destroying superweapon that was the culmination of the Empire's research into dark energy translations and hyperspace tunneling. Held in secret by the First Order, its modifications allowed Ilum to act as a mobile base and major weapons platform until it was destroyed by the Resistance in desperation after Starkiller's destruction of the Hosnian system. Following the attack, led by Poe Dameron, the planet collapsed into a star that would later be named Solo after the legendary smuggler Han Solo, who died at Ilum."
        },
        {
          name: "Exegol",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Csilla",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Rakata",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },
        {
          name: "Ahch-To",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        },

        // Wild Space
        {
          name: "Dosuun",
          climate: "",
          terrain: "",
          population: "",
          diameter: "",
          orbital_period: "",
          rotation_period: "",
          surface_water: "",
          gravity: "",
          description: ""
        }
      ];
      
      setTimeout(() => {
        setSystems(mockSystems);
        setLoading(false);
      }, 1000);
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Systems loading error:', error);
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchSystems();
    
    const interval = setInterval(() => {
      console.log('Updating data...');
      fetchSystems();
    }, 30000);

    return () => clearInterval(interval);
  }, []);

  // Login form validation
  const validateLogin = () => {
    const errors = {};
    
    if (!loginForm.username.trim()) {
      errors.username = "Username must not be empty";
    } else if (loginForm.username.length < 3) {
      errors.username = "Username must contain 3 or more characters";
    }
    
    if (!loginForm.password.trim()) {
      errors.password = "Password must not be empty";
    } else if (loginForm.password.length < 6) {
      errors.password = "Password must contain 6 or more characters";
    }
    
    setLoginErrors(errors);
    return Object.keys(errors).length === 0;
  };

  const handleLogin = () => {
    if (validateLogin()) {
      setUser({ username: loginForm.username, role: 'jedi' });
      setShowLogin(false);
      setLoginForm({ username: '', password: '' });
    }
  };

  const handleQuizAnswer = (answerIndex) => {
    setQuiz(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      selectedAnswer: answerIndex
    }));
  };

  const submitQuizAnswer = () => {
    if (quiz.selectedAnswer === null) return;
    
    const isCorrect = quiz.selectedAnswer === quiz.questions[quiz.currentQuestion].correct;
    const newScore = isCorrect ? quiz.score + 1 : quiz.score;
    
    if (quiz.currentQuestion < quiz.questions.length - 1) {
      setQuiz(prev => ({
        ...prev,
        currentQuestion: prev.currentQuestion + 1,
        score: newScore,
        selectedAnswer: null
      }));
    } else {
      setQuiz(prev => ({
        ...prev,
        score: newScore,
        completed: true,
        showResults: true
      }));
    }
  };

  const resetQuiz = () => {
    setQuiz(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      currentQuestion: 0,
      score: 0,
      selectedAnswer: null,
      completed: false,
      showResults: false
    }));
  };

  const handleSystemClick = (systemName) => {
    const system = systems.find(s => s.name === systemName);
    if (system) {
      setSelectedSystem(system);
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-black via-purple-900 to-black text-white">
      {/* Header */}
      <nav className="bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-800 to-indigo-900 shadow-lg border-b border-purple-500">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
          <div className="flex justify-between items-center h-16">
            <h1 className="text-xl sm:text-2xl font-bold text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-300 to-pink-300">
              Star Wars Galactic Navigation Archieve
            </h1>
            <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
              {user ? (
                <div className="flex items-center space-x-3">
                  <span className="text-purple-200 text-sm sm:text-base">Hey, {user.username}!</span>
                  <button 
                    className="px-3 py-1 bg-purple-600 hover:bg-purple-700 rounded-lg transition-colors border border-purple-400 text-sm"
                    onClick={() => setUser(null)}
                  >
                    Sign out
                  </button>
                </div>
              ) : (
                <button 
                  className="px-4 py-2 bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-indigo-600 hover:from-purple-700 hover:to-indigo-700 rounded-lg transition-all transform hover:scale-105 shadow-lg border border-purple-400 text-sm"
                  onClick={() => setShowLogin(true)}
                >
                  Sign in
                </button>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </nav>

      {/* Login Modal */}
      {showLogin && (
        <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-75 flex items-center justify-center z-50 p-4">
          <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-900 to-indigo-900 p-6 rounded-xl shadow-2xl border border-purple-500 max-w-md w-full">
            <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
              <h2 className="text-xl font-bold text-purple-200">Sign in your account</h2>
              <button 
                className="text-purple-300 hover:text-white text-2xl"
                onClick={() => setShowLogin(false)}
              >
                ✕
              </button>
            </div>
            <div className="space-y-4">
              <div>
                <label className="block text-purple-200 mb-2">Username</label>
                <input
                  type="text"
                  className={`w-full p-3 bg-black bg-opacity-50 border rounded-lg text-white placeholder-purple-300 ${
                    loginErrors.username ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-purple-500'
                  } focus:border-purple-300 focus:outline-none`}
                  value={loginForm.username}
                  onChange={(e) => setLoginForm(prev => ({...prev, username: e.target.value}))}
                  placeholder="Enter username"
                />
                {loginErrors.username && (
                  <p className="text-red-400 text-sm mt-1">{loginErrors.username}</p>
                )}
              </div>
              <div>
                <label className="block text-purple-200 mb-2">Password</label>
                <input
                  type="password"
                  className={`w-full p-3 bg-black bg-opacity-50 border rounded-lg text-white placeholder-purple-300 ${
                    loginErrors.password ? 'border-red-500' : 'border-purple-500'
                  } focus:border-purple-300 focus:outline-none`}
                  value={loginForm.password}
                  onChange={(e) => setLoginForm(prev => ({...prev, password: e.target.value}))}
                  placeholder="Enter password"
                />
                {loginErrors.password && (
                  <p className="text-red-400 text-sm mt-1">{loginErrors.password}</p>
                )}
              </div>
              <div className="flex space-x-3 pt-2">
                <button 
                  className="flex-1 py-2 bg-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-700 rounded-lg transition-colors"
                  onClick={() => setShowLogin(false)}
                >
                  Cancel
                </button>
                <button 
                  className="flex-1 py-2 bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-indigo-600 hover:from-purple-700 hover:to-indigo-700 rounded-lg transition-all transform hover:scale-105"
                  onClick={handleLogin}
                >
                  Confirm
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      )}

      <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 py-6">
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 xl:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
          {/* Galaxy Map */}
          <div className="xl:col-span-2">
            <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-900 to-indigo-900 rounded-xl shadow-2xl border border-purple-500 overflow-hidden">
              <div className="p-4 border-b border-purple-500 flex justify-between items-center">
                <h2 className="text-lg sm:text-xl font-bold text-purple-200">Complete Galaxy Map</h2>
                <button 
                  className="px-3 py-1 bg-purple-600 hover:bg-purple-700 rounded-lg transition-colors text-sm border border-purple-400"
                  onClick={fetchSystems}
                >
                  Update
                </button>
              </div>
              <div className="relative bg-gray-950 bg-opacity-80 h-80 sm:h-96 overflow-hidden">

                {/* Region Shapes */}
                <div className="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center">
                    <div className="absolute top-1/2 left-1/2 w-[43rem] h-[24rem] transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 bg-blue-950/40 border border-blue-800 backdrop-blur-md" style={{ borderRadius: '50%' }}></div>
                    <div className="absolute top-[50%] left-[22%] w-[12rem] h-[16rem] transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 bg-gray-900/100 border border-2 border-black" style={{ borderRadius: '50%' }}></div>
                    <div className="absolute left-1/2 top-1/2 w-28 h-14 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 border opacity-40 bg-white/60 backdrop-blur-sm" style={{ borderRadius: '50%' }}></div>
                    <div className="absolute left-[53%] top-1/2 w-56 h-36 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 border rounded-full opacity-35 bg-cyan-100/50 backdrop-blur-md" style={{ borderRadius: '50%' }}></div>
                    <div className="absolute left-[56%] top-1/2 w-80 h-56 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 border rounded-full opacity-30 bg-cyan-200/40 backdrop-blur-lg" style={{ borderRadius: '50%' }}></div>
                    <div className="absolute left-[59%] top-1/2 w-96 h-72 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 border rounded-full opacity-25 bg-cyan-300/30 backdrop-blur-xl" style={{ borderRadius: '50%' }}></div>
                    <div className="absolute left-[62%] top-1/2 w-[28rem] h-80 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 border rounded-full opacity-20 bg-cyan-400/20 backdrop-blur-2xl" style={{ borderRadius: '50%' }}></div>
                    <div className="absolute top-1/2 right-[16%] w-20 h-32 transform translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 rounded-full bg-red-500/60 border-2 border-red-800" style={{ borderRadius: '50%' }}></div>
                </div>

                {/* Region Names */}
                <div className="absolute inset-0 text-xs opacity-70 font-semibold pointer-events-none">
                    {/* Wild Space*/}
                    <div className="absolute bottom-[-1%] left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-center">
                        <div className="bg-black bg-opacity-40 px-2 py-1 rounded text-yellow-300 font-bold">Wild Space</div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Unknown Regions*/}
                    <div className="absolute top-1/2 left-[22%] transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-center">
                        <div className="bg-black bg-opacity-40 px-2 py-1 rounded text-purple-600 font-bold">Unknown Regions</div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Hutt Space*/}
                    <div className="absolute top-1/2 right-[6.5%] transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-center">
                        <div className="bg-black bg-opacity-40 px-2 py-1 rounded text-red-600 font-bold">Hutt Space</div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Outer Rim */}
                    <div className="absolute top-[86%] right-[26%] transform translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-center">
                        <div className="bg-black bg-opacity-40 px-2 py-1 rounded text-purple-200 font-bold">Outer Rim</div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Mid Rim */}
                    <div className="absolute top-[78%] right-[31%] transform translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-center">
                        <div className="bg-black bg-opacity-40 px-2 py-1 rounded text-blue-300 font-bold">Mid Rim</div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Inner Rim */}
                    <div className="absolute top-[69%] right-[36%] transform translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-center">
                        <div className="bg-black bg-opacity-40 px-2 py-1 rounded text-cyan-400 font-bold">Inner Rim</div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Core Worlds */}
                    <div className="absolute top-[60%] right-[32%] transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-center">
                        <div className="bg-black bg-opacity-40 px-2 py-1 rounded text-cyan-700 font-bold">Core Worlds</div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Deep Core */}
                    <div className="absolute top-1/2 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-center">
                        <div className="bg-black bg-opacity-40 px-3 py-1 rounded text-blue-900 font-bold">Deep Core</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                {/* Stars background */}
                <div className="absolute inset-0 pointer-events-none">
                  {[...Array(100)].map((_, i) => (
                    <div
                      key={i}
                      className="absolute bg-white rounded-full animate-pulse"
                      style={{
                        left: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
                        top: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
                        width: `${Math.random() * 2 + 0.5}px`,
                        height: `${Math.random() * 2 + 0.5}px`,
                        animationDelay: `${Math.random() * 5}s`,
                        animationDuration: `${Math.random() * 3 + 2}s`
                      }}
                    />
                  ))}
                </div>
                
                {/* Systems */}
                {!loading && systems.map((system) => {
                  const position = systemPositions[system.name];
                  if (!position) return null;
                  
                  return (
                    <div
                      key={system.name}
                      className="absolute transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 cursor-pointer transition-all hover:scale-150 group z-10"
                      style={{
                        left: `${position.x}%`,
                        top: `${position.y}%`
                      }}
                      onClick={() => handleSystemClick(system.name)}
                    >
                      <div
                        className="w-2 h-2 rounded-full shadow-lg border border-white hover:border-purple-300 animate-pulse"
                        style={{ backgroundColor: position.color }}
                      />
                      <div className="absolute -bottom-8 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 text-xs text-purple-200 whitespace-nowrap opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity bg-black bg-opacity-75 px-2 py-1 rounded pointer-events-none">
                        {system.name}
                        <div className="text-xs text-purple-400">{position.region}</div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  );
                })}
                
                {loading && (
                  <div className="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center z-20">
                    <div className="text-center">
                      <div className="w-12 h-12 border-4 border-purple-500 border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin mx-auto mb-4"></div>
                      <p className="text-purple-200">Loading the Galaxy...</p>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Selected System Details */}
            {selectedSystem && (
              <div className="mt-6 bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-900 to-indigo-900 rounded-xl shadow-2xl border border-purple-500">
                <div className="p-4 border-b border-purple-500 flex justify-between items-center">
                  <h3 className="text-lg sm:text-xl font-bold text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-yellow-300 to-orange-300">
                    {selectedSystem.name} System
                  </h3>
                  <button 
                    className="text-purple-300 hover:text-white text-xl"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedSystem(null)}
                  >
                    ✕
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="p-6">
                  <figure className="flex flex-col items-center mb-62">
                    <img className="max-h-60 max-w-full object-contain rounded-lg shadow-lg border-2 border-purple-700 mb-2" src={selectedSystem.img} alt="Image couldn't load"/>
                    <figcaption className="text-sm text-purple-100 text-center">Planet {selectedSystem.main_planet}</figcaption>
                  </figure>
                  <p className="text-purple-100 mb-4 leading-relaxed">{selectedSystem.description}</p>
                  <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
                    <div>
                      <h4 className="text-purple-300 font-semibold mb-3">Traits of {selectedSystem.main_planet}:</h4>
                      <div className="space-y-2 text-sm">
                        <p><span className="text-purple-400">Diameter:</span> {selectedSystem.diameter} km</p>
                        <p><span className="text-purple-400">Orbital period:</span> {selectedSystem.orbital_period} days</p>
                        <p><span className="text-purple-400">Rotation period:</span> {selectedSystem.rotation_period} hours</p>
                        <p><span className="text-purple-400">Population:</span> ∼{selectedSystem.population}</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                      <h4 className="text-purple-300 font-semibold mb-3">Conditions of {selectedSystem.main_planet}:</h4>
                      <div className="space-y-2 text-sm">
                        <p><span className="text-purple-400">Gravity:</span> {selectedSystem.gravity}</p>
                        <p><span className="text-purple-400">Air:</span> {selectedSystem.air}</p>
                        <p><span className="text-purple-400">Surface water:</span> {selectedSystem.surface_water}%</p>
                        <p><span className="text-purple-400">Climate:</span> {selectedSystem.climate}</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          {/* Sidebar */}
          <div className="space-y-6">
            {/* Quiz Section */}
            <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-900 to-indigo-900 rounded-xl shadow-2xl border border-purple-500">
              <div className="p-4 border-b border-purple-500">
                <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-purple-200">Star Wars Systems Quiz</h3>
              </div>
              <div className="p-6">
                {!quiz.completed ? (
                  <>
                    <div className="flex space-x-2 mb-4">
                      <span className="px-3 py-1 bg-purple-600 text-white text-sm rounded-lg">
                        Question {quiz.currentQuestion + 1} of {quiz.questions.length}
                      </span>
                      <span className="px-3 py-1 bg-green-600 text-white text-sm rounded-lg">
                        Score: {quiz.score}
                      </span>
                    </div>
                    <h4 className="text-purple-100 mb-4">{quiz.questions[quiz.currentQuestion].question}</h4>
                    <div className="space-y-2 mb-4">
                      {quiz.questions[quiz.currentQuestion].options.map((option, index) => (
                        <label key={index} className="flex items-center space-x-2 cursor-pointer p-2 rounded-lg hover:bg-purple-800 transition-colors">
                          <input
                            type="radio"
                            name="quizAnswer"
                            checked={quiz.selectedAnswer === index}
                            onChange={() => handleQuizAnswer(index)}
                            className="text-purple-600 focus:ring-purple-500"
                          />
                          <span className="text-purple-100">{option}</span>
                        </label>
                      ))}
                    </div>
                    <button 
                      className="w-full py-2 bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-indigo-600 hover:from-purple-700 hover:to-indigo-700 rounded-lg transition-all transform hover:scale-105 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:hover:scale-100"
                      onClick={submitQuizAnswer}
                      disabled={quiz.selectedAnswer === null}
                    >
                      {quiz.currentQuestion < quiz.questions.length - 1 ? 'Next' : 'Finish'}
                    </button>
                  </>
                ) : (
                  <div className="text-center">
                    <h4 className="text-xl text-purple-100 mb-2">Quiz over!</h4>
                    <p className="text-lg text-purple-200 mb-4">
                      Your result: {quiz.score} of {quiz.questions.length}
                      <br/>
                      ({Math.round((quiz.score / quiz.questions.length) * 100)}%)
                    </p>
                    <button 
                      className="px-6 py-2 bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-indigo-600 hover:from-purple-700 hover:to-indigo-700 rounded-lg transition-all transform hover:scale-105"
                      onClick={resetQuiz}
                    >
                      Try again
                    </button>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Survey Section */}
            <div className="bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-900 to-indigo-900 rounded-xl shadow-2xl border border-purple-500">
              <div className="p-4 border-b border-purple-500">
                <h3 className="text-lg font-bold text-purple-200">Survey</h3>
              </div>
              <div className="p-6 space-y-4">
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-purple-300 mb-2">Your favourite faction:</label>
                  <select 
                    className="w-full p-2 bg-black bg-opacity-50 border border-purple-500 rounded-lg text-white focus:border-purple-300 focus:outline-none"
                    value={surveyData.favoriteFaction}
                    onChange={(e) => setSurveyData(prev => ({...prev, favoriteFaction: e.target.value}))}
                  >
                    <option value="">Choose a faction</option>
                    <option value="Order of Jedi">Order of Jedi</option>
                    <option value="Order of Sith">Order of Sith</option>
                    <option value="Rebel Alliance">Rebel Alliance</option>
                    <option value="Galactic Empire">Galactic Empire</option>
                    <option value="Galactic Republic">Galactic Republic</option>
                  </select>
                </div>

                <div>
                  <label className="block text-purple-300 mb-2">Visited systems:</label>
                  <div className="space-y-2">
                    {['Tatooine', 'Coruscant', 'Naboo', 'Hoth'].map(system => (
                      <label key={system} className="flex items-center space-x-2 cursor-pointer">
                        <input
                          type="checkbox"
                          checked={surveyData.visitedSystems.includes(system)}
                          onChange={(e) => {
                            if (e.target.checked) {
                              setSurveyData(prev => ({
                                ...prev,
                                visitedSystems: [...prev.visitedSystems, system]
                              }));
                            } else {
                              setSurveyData(prev => ({
                                ...prev,
                                visitedSystems: prev.visitedSystems.filter(p => p !== system)
                              }));
                            }
                          }}
                          className="text-purple-600 focus:ring-purple-500"
                        />
                        <span className="text-purple-100">{system}</span>
                      </label>
                    ))}
                  </div>
                </div>

                <div>
                  <label className="block text-purple-300 mb-2">Knowledge level:</label>
                  <div className="space-y-2">
                    {['Younling', 'Padawan', 'Knight', 'Master'].map(level => (
                      <label key={level} className="flex items-center space-x-2 cursor-pointer">
                        <input
                          type="radio"
                          name="galaxyKnowledge"
                          checked={surveyData.galaxyKnowledge === level}
                          onChange={() => setSurveyData(prev => ({...prev, galaxyKnowledge: level}))}
                          className="text-purple-600 focus:ring-purple-500"
                        />
                        <span className="text-purple-100">{level}</span>
                      </label>
                    ))}
                  </div>
                </div>

                {(surveyData.favoriteFaction || surveyData.visitedSystems.length > 0 || surveyData.galaxyKnowledge) && (
                  <div className="bg-purple-800 bg-opacity-50 border border-purple-600 rounded-lg p-4">
                    <h4 className="text-purple-200 font-semibold mb-2">Your answers:</h4>
                    <div className="text-sm space-y-1">
                      {surveyData.favoriteFaction && <p><span className="text-purple-400">Faction:</span> {surveyData.favoriteFaction}</p>}
                      {surveyData.visitedSystems.length > 0 && <p><span className="text-purple-400">Systems:</span> {surveyData.visitedSystems.join(', ')}</p>}
                      {surveyData.galaxyKnowledge && <p><span className="text-purple-400">Level:</span> {surveyData.galaxyKnowledge}</p>}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Footer */}
      <footer className="bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-800 to-indigo-900 text-center py-4 mt-8 border-t border-purple-500">
        <p className="text-purple-200 font-semibold">May the Force be with you!</p>
        <p className="text-purple-300 text-sm">Data is automatically updated every 30 seconds</p>
      </footer>
    </div>
  );
};

export default StarWarsGalaxyMap;
